long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Social Magnet: Bluesky, Twitter, LinkedIn Finder

Find, search, and connect with people on LinkedIn, Twitter, and Bluesky effortlessly with Social Magnet’s smart networking tools.

Features:
>> Seamless Cross-Platform Searches: Effortlessly search for people on LinkedIn, Twitter, and Bluesky with just a name.
Right-Click Search Functionality: Highlight any text on a webpage, right-click, and populate the search bar with the selected name for quick searches.
>> Enhanced Usability: Automatically preloads selected text into the extension’s search bar for faster access.
>> Badge Notifications: Stay informed with real-time badge highlights on the extension icon when new text is ready for search.
User-Friendly Interface: Simple design that focuses on what matters—expanding your social connections.

Why Social Magnet?
Save time and effort by eliminating the manual hassle of searching for people across different platforms. Social Magnet is perfect for:

Recruiters looking to source talent on LinkedIn and Twitter.
>> Marketers seeking influencers or partners on Bluesky.
>> Individuals expanding their professional or personal network.

How It Works:
>> Install Social Magnet from the Chrome Web Store.
>> Use the popup to enter a name and search on LinkedIn, Twitter, or Bluesky.
>> Highlight text on any webpage and use the right-click menu to send the name to Social Magnet for quick searches.
>> Let Social Magnet handle the rest while you focus on making connections! 

Social Magnet now includes a badge notification feature! When you highlight text on a webpage and use the right-click menu, the selected text is sent to the search bar, and the extension icon highlights with a 'NEW' badge as a visual confirmation. The badge resets when the popup is opened."
